short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hold <space> in Google Meet to talk instead of fumbling around trying to mute and unmute

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple add-on that allows you to mute and unmute yourself with a key press instead of fumbling around trying to click the icon. Now works in Google Meet *and* Zoom web client! 

This software is provided by Zoomcorder.com
